page.title: 05Interviewing a Farm Worker
page.content: {Mr. Cundy}whom I interviewed worked on three farms.The first one was owned by Mr. Cheeseman.He worked there for two years. They used{two horses}and one{man}to each plough.They had{14 milk cows}on this farm. He worked there for{Sixty years.}In the Winter they had fewer workers than in the Summer.None of the workers worked shifts but he worked from{Six {AM}to{Six PM}six days a week altogether{seventy-two hours}a week. At first they herded the sheep in and out of the farm themselves. Later on they used{one sheep dog. Twelve {pigs}were kept.Every farm worker had fresh jobs each day.
